recipesJson.name: Sadlad Toast Crunch
recipesJson.author: Rageisalotofwork
recipesJson.description:
Original artwork done by Matthew Kocanda at http://matthew-kocanda.com/

This is my take on Cinnamon Toast Crunch. Its pretty god damn good. Lots of stuff in it. Some cinnamons. Some crunches. Other things too. 

I've been forcing people to try different versions of this recipe for the last month and this is by far the best and most authentic. A sharp cereal with a touch of milk, works as a Shake and Vape but really forms after two or three days. I recommend it to everyone.

reviews.text: taste just like cinnamon toast crunch ! end of story. nice job !

I love Cinnamon Toast Crunch and cereal vapes in general. This has to be the best I have ever made and tasted. I did have to make a couple of subs as I only have regular TPA Marshmallow and FW Sweet Cream. I feel like it could be even better with toasted marshmallow. Will deffo get that on my next order as I WILL be making this again and again. Top recipe. Thanks a lot.
Yummy! Thank you,and nice work! There‚Äôs a reserved spot in the cabinet for it right next to my Cinnamon Custard
definitely the MVP here!
Amazing recipe, mixed it so many times already

This is my favorite recipe so far, because it demonstrates what is possible with DIY flavor creation. It is a very accurate profile of Cinnamon Toast Crunch with nice touch of sweet, rich milk. The somewhat grainy mouthfeel that is produced by a sizable amount of cinnamon, wheat, and rice, along with the notes of cream and marshmallow really instill this recipe with a sense of nostalgia. The pairing of Cereal 27 and Rice Crunchies gives this recipe a wonderful body that really completes the cereal effect. After steeping for a few days the cinnamon from the Cinnamon Danish Swirl mellows out some which allows for the other flavors to come through more. The most interesting part of this recipe to me is how Pie Crust is used to add a hint of dark, caramelized sugar. I do recommend trying this recipe with a small amount of sweetener added for the cinnamon sugar aspect to come through. Other than that I don't have anything that I would alter about this recipe, it's seriously awesome and I highly suggest that you mix some up if you haven't already.

Just finished making my second batch of this stuff, wow!! I'm fairly new to mixing but this is by far the most accurate rendition of a profile. This vape taste exactly like it says, it is undeniably cinnamon toast crunch with milk. Can't get over how spot on it is. Mix it up and see for yourself!! Perfect
Really loving this vape. Very spot on for CTC.

Im at a loss as to how you only have a 4 star rating on this mix i see way more 5 star then 4 fuck it bro this shit is fire ive been making this up every single week sence the day it went up GOOD JOB Matthew .

This recipe deserves 5 stars for its creativity and execution. You can feel the milk along with the texture of the cinnamon cereals.
I noticed that 3 days was not enough steep because of the cinnamon which was a bit aggressive for me, and I love cinnamon.
Love this stuff. Great recipe!
not too bad

I was originally turned off by this recipe after mixing it, reading another review about it being a spot on shake and vape. Seriously do not shake and vape this... It needs a steep. I actually gave it to a buddy and it sat in his cabinet for a week before I tried it again and oh my god, dead-nuts accurate CTC. 
I do get a bit sick of it after having it in my tank all day but it doesn't get much better than this. Hands down my favorite cereal vape, kudos man. This recipe definitely deserves all the praise it's been getting
The profile is so accurate, definitely my favourite cinnamon and/or cereal vape.
Wow. It's friggin' perfect.  You win breakfast vapes good sir!

Proper CTC, spot on.  I fell out of love with cinnamon vapes, but a sample of BDV's CTC Cereal got me interested again.  After that ran out, whipped this up, and shitfire save matches it's the best thing I've ever mixed.  Congrats, and thank you!
all ingredients blend together nicely to make an excellent vape
This is my favorite juice!  Tastes just like the breakfast cereal, including the milk.  Unbelievably great!
This is delicious.  Can't vape it all the time though.
Spot on as a shake and vape.

It's been years since I was last in the states and even longer since I've had CTC. The memory of the taste was a little foggy but the moment I dripped this on my coils I had a moment of "Oh yeah, that's what Cinnamon Toast Crunch tasted like". Spookily accurate and delicious, have been through 200ml of this easily. Inspirational work dude!
great mix and very moreish 5 stars

Finally! This was good after the 3 days, but after 10 or so it is the best Cinnamon Toast Crunch. I've been searching and trying to make something to that profile for so long I'd given up, but this is it!!
Good CTC flavor! Imo it needs 1% FLV Cinnamon Crunch to make it pop! Otherwise it's an awesome recipe... Probably the best CTC recipe on here... Nice job!üëçüëç
This is really great, I'm extremely impressed with how accurate it is. Great job!
Fantastic.  Can't wait to taste it after steeping, but I fear this 30ml bottle may not last even that long.
The hype is real!! This stuff is spot on Cinnamon Toast Crunch! Great job!!! I'll be making a 120 of this today!!
This recipe is ridiculous! This IS Cinnamon Toast Crunch cereal. I was thinking this would get old after a while... I was wrong. Absolutely great work on this recipe!
Taste just like a spoonful of CTC with that hint of milk to it. Could almost say 'end of the bowl' as well.
Holy shit! I'm blown away by how perfectly accurate this is to a bowl of Cinnamon Toast Crunch with milk.
Very good S&V cant wait untill it has a few days to steep!! Nice job!! Thanks for sharing.

Excellent recipe!  After a steep this recipe is awesome. Not a fan of cereal vapes until I mixed this one.
Thanks for sharing!

If you like cereal vapes, look no further. This (like others have said) is 100% spot on. Usually I am not a fan of Cap Sweet Cream, but it works so well here with the fresh cream, creating the perfect bottom of the bowl cereal milk. 10/10!
Spot on Cinnamon Toast Crunch! And it's the best cereal vape I've ever had. Thank you for this!

1st class cereal vape - I was suspicious of the 3% CDS but the whole thing is perfectly balanced and super tasty after 72 hours steep. 
Nice work!
This is a homerun!  Taste is spot on.  This is now part of my everyday rotation.

Absolutely amazing take on Cinnamon Toast Crunch with a perfect amount of each one of those components . The cds is used with precision and the use of pie crust may have taught us all something . Rage has done it again . Great job on this one .
This recipe is a light on the cinnamon, cinnamon toast crunch with a slight milk note and I love. This stuff is delicious as its been said previously. Great job Rage.
I give this five stars after only a ten minute shake it's amazing.  My wife even loves  it too!! $$$I am making it again for my wife now we love it.
Absolute fire and that's after a shake n vape.
Really nice authentic  Cinnamon Toast Crunch. Everything blends perfectly recommend to all who have been searching for  this cereal

What can I say? When I seen that this recipe contained cap CDS I honestly continued to carry on walking it's definitely a flavour I'd totally fell out of love for but after some positive feedback I pulled the trigger and thought I'd try. The actual recipe looked great it has everything I enjoy apart from CDS but hey I could be missing out not trying. Wow as a cereal fan this doesn't disappoint everything works together beautifully it's crunchy, it's sticky and thick bodied and the cream blends perfectly to prevent the flavour from drying out. What I love is the CDS isn't forward it's enough to add plesent notes of mystery alongside the toasted aspect of the marshmallow and pie crust . Great use of flavours that I would never imagine would work. Highly recommended I'm glad I mixed a large batch it's definitely going into my rotation.

I am honestly in awe at how amazing this is. This is truly Cinnamon Toast Crunch. Never again did I think I would be able to vape CAP CDS, but it's balanced so well to lend it's pastry cinnamon flavor to the snap of the cereal and pie flavors. On top of that, the brown sugar flavor has been absolutely nailed, without any sort of brown sugar flavoring. Even down to the milk with the FA Cream Fresh and CAP Sweet Cream. It's perfect. Everything is perfect. There is no point in trying to replicate Cinnamon Toast Crunch as long as this recipe exists.

This is a really good cinnamon toast crunch cereal. I personally get more of a bottom of the bowl taste from it that whole bowl. Maybe I need to let it steep longer than 24 hours. Fantastic as a shake and vape, mix bigger than 30 approved, and you might even be able to get the full steep test on it :)
